document_data.mainbody:
Gildengloop was a svirfneblin city in the deadly Underdark, long-abandoned by 1370 DR.
Gildengloop was an insignificant settlement apart from one detail it was one of the thirteen destinations of the teleport without error spell ward that protected the hidden lair of a wizard who resided in Nonthal circa the . The wizards lair - Nonthals Hold, was protected by thirteen gates that, in not deactivated with the correct command word, spirited the intruder away. Gildengloop was the destination of the ninth gate.
